casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. D.D.
v.
LUCAS CTY. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 2019-1169 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Sua sponte, appellees ordered to file a response, if any, to appellants' motion to stay lower-court proceedings no later than 10:00 a.m. on Tuesday, August 27, 2019.
